data.title: PCI Section 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.network.session_id contains "*"
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*" 
| comp count() as counter by xdm.network.rule 
| fields xdm.network.*, counter
| limit 10000
| view graph type = column subtype = grouped header = "XDM Network Rule" xaxis = xdm.network.rule yaxis = counter

data.title: PCI Section 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter xdm.source.agent.version contains "*"
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.version, xdm.source.host.ipv4_addresses, xdm.source.host.mac_addresses, xdm.source.host.os, xdm.source.agent.content_version, xdm.source.agent.identifier

data.title: PCI Section 3: Protect Stored Account Data
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*"
| dedup xdm.source.host.hostname 
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.observer.content_version

data.title: PCI Section 4: Protect Cardholder Data with Strong Cryptography During Transmission Over Open, Public Networks
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type contains "*"
| fields xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type , xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.ipv4, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.port, xdm.target.host.hostname, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.user.username 
| limit 500

data.title: PCI Section 5: Protect All Systems and Networks from Malicious Software
data.phrase:
//Protect All Systems and Networks from Malicious Software

datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter xdm.source.agent.version contains "*"
| dedup xdm.source.host.hostname 
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.version, xdm.source.host.ipv4_addresses, xdm.source.host.mac_addresses, xdm.source.host.os, xdm.source.agent.content_version, xdm.source.agent.identifier 
| comp count () by xdm.source.agent.version
| view graph type = column subtype = grouped xaxis = xdm.source.agent.version yaxis = count_1

data.title: PCI Section 6: Develop and Maintain Secure Systems and Software
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter xdm.source.host.os contains "*"
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.host.ipv4_addresses, xdm.source.host.mac_addresses, xdm.source.host.os, xdm.source.host.os_family

data.title: PCI Section 7: Restrict Access to System Components and Cardholder Data by Business Need to Know
data.phrase:
datamodel
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*"
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id

data.title: PCI Section 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components
data.phrase:
//Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components

datamodel 
| filter xdm.target.location.region contains "*" 
| fields xdm.target.agent.identifier, xdm.target.asn.as_name, xdm.target.asn.as_number, xdm.target.host.fqdn, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.location.city, xdm.target.location.continent, xdm.target.location.country, xdm.target.location.latitude, xdm.target.location.longitude , xdm.target.location.region
| comp count(xdm.target.location.country) as counter by xdm.target.location.country 
| view graph type = map xaxis = xdm.target.location.country yaxis = counter default_limit = `false` seriestitle("counter","Volume")

data.title: PCI Section 9: Restrict Physical Access to Cardholder Data
data.phrase:
//Restrict Physical Access to Cardholder Data

datamodel
| filter xdm.source.user.badge_id != "*"
| fields xdm.source.user.first_name, xdm.source.user.last_name, xdm.source.user.middle_name, xdm.source.user.employee_id, xdm.source.user.badge_id

data.title: PCI Section 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data
data.phrase:
//Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data

datamodel 
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*" 
| filter xdm.source.host.hostname contains "*" 
| comp count() as counter by xdm.source.host.hostname
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, counter
| limit 10000
| sort desc counter
| view graph type = wordcloud xaxis = xdm.source.host.hostname yaxis = counter

data.title: PCI Section 11: Test Security of Systems and Networks Regularly
data.phrase:
//Test Security of Systems and Networks Regularly

datamodel 
| filter xdm.event.operation contains "REGISTRY"/*Filter for registry events*/
| filter xdm.event.operation contains "*"
| fields _time, xdm.event.type, xdm.event.operation, xdm.event.operation_sub_type, xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.source.process.name, xdm.source.process.executable.path, xdm.event.outcome, xdm.observer.product

data.title: PCI Section 12: Support Information Security with Organizational Policies and Programs
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*"
| sort desc xdm.observer.content_version
| dedup xdm.source.host.hostname 
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.observer.content_version
